Notes: A flower-like enemy that moves around in a twirling motion. They attack by turning into a flower that spins around rapidly. If no path is assigned, it will only spin in place. It can be defeated by all of the player's attacks. Furthermore, it can be eaten by Yoshi and frozen by the Orange Luma. Shooting a Star Bit at it will stun it.

Rail.Description: The optional path that it can move on.
